page.content: Commercially the forest provides a living for 4 {charcoal burners }who work throughout the year,producing charcoal almost exclusively for { {barbeque fuel.}These men clear areas of the forest under the direction of the owner during the winter months. Wood which can be used for fencing etc. is taken to the sawmill and the rest is stacked for making charcoal. There are 6 {locally made metal kilns in operation. They were designed by the father of the present charcoal burner. The kiln is tightly packed, fired and burned for 36 hrs.Contents are reduced by 33% {Charcoal is {graded}by sieving before packing in sacks for marketing.
